# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #68](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#68)

#### [NewbSombreroÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fs9lp?context=3)

Are Splinters primarily Spiritual?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Less physical. More a blend of the other two.
